snippet: Choosing a real estate agent for selling a home may seem simple, but there is much to understand about the role of the agent and how the relationship works.
abstract: Getting Started column; homeowners planning to sell New York City property have many factors to consider when choosing a real estate agent.
lead_paragraph: Choosing a real estate agent for selling a home may seem simple, but there is much to understand about the role of the agent and how the relationship works.

headline.print_headline: Making It Exclusive: Signing With an Agent
headline.main: Making It Exclusive: Signing With an Agent
